definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: take possession of, inherit, dispossess (MI:7 [[וירש]] take possession of; Aram. [[יְרֵית]], yiret, take possession of, and be heir to, inherit; so Eth. warasa: Ar. wari3a inherit; v. also Sab. [[ורתַ]] inherit, CIS:iv, 37, 3), esp. D (62 t. Qal, 1 t. Pi, 7 t. Hiph. in Dt + 13 t. D in Jos);—
take possession of, esp. by force, have as a possession, often with collat. idea of taking in place of others, succeeding to, inheriting (cf.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: land, sq. acc. Ge 15:7, Ge 15:8, Nu 13:30, Nu 21:24, Nu 21:35, Jos 18:13 (all JE), Jos 24:4, Jos 24:8 (E), Ju Jdg 2:6, Jdg 11:21, Jdg 11:22, Jdg 11:23, Jdg 11:24, Jdg 11:24, Jdg 18:9, De 1:8, De 1:21, De 1:39 + 25 t. Dt, + † De 11:31, De 17:14, De 26:1 (all possess land and dwell therein), similarly Is 65:9, Is 65:9, Ps 69:36; [[בְּאַרְעַם מִשְׁנֶה יִירָָשׁוּ]] Is 61:7 in their land they shall possess the double; [[הָחֵל רָשׁ]] De 2:24; [[הָחֵל רָשׁ לָרֶשֶׁת אֶת־אַרְחוֹ]] v:De 2:31; esp. phr. ([[הארץ]]) [[שָׁמָּה לְרִשְׁתָּהּ]] (etc. [[עׂבְרִים]]) [[אֲשֶׁר אַתֶּם בָּאִים]] De 4:5, De 4:14, De 4:26 + 12 t. Dt, also Ezr 9:10; v. De 30:18, Jos 1:11, Jos 1:11, Jos 1:15, Jos 1:15, Jos 12:1, Jos 13:1, Jos 21:41, Jos 23:5 (all D); Am 2:10, Ob:Ob 19, Ob:Ob 19, Hb Hab 1:6, Ez Eze 33:24, Eze 33:25, Eze 33:26, Le 20:24, Le 20:24 (H), Ge 28:4, Nu 33:53 (both P), 1Ch 28:8, Ne 9:15, Ne 9:22, Ne 9:23, Ne 9:24, Ps 25:13, Ps 37:9, Ps 37:11, Ps 37:22, Ps 37:29, Ps 37:34; + [[ב]] instr. Ps 44:4; also [[וַעֲמַל לְאֻמִּים יִירָָשׁוּ]] Ps 105:44 (‖[[וִיִּחֵן]] [[לָהֶם אַרְחוֹת גּוֹיִם]]); † take possession of fields Je 8:10 (obj. not expr.), 1Ki 21:15, 1Ki 21:16, 1Ki 21:18, 1Ki 21:19, Ps 83:13; inheritance (in land) Nu 27:11, Nu 36:8, Nu 36:8 (all P); city (cities), Jos 19:47 (JE), Ju Jdg 3:13, Ob:Ob 20; so [[הַר־קָדְשִׁי]] Is 57:13 (‖[[נחל ארץ]]), Is 63:18 where rd. prob. [[הַר־]] [[קָדְשֶָׁךְ]] (for MT ´[[עַם־ק]], see LXX VB and ‖ cl.); possess city and dwell therein 2Ki 17:24, Is 34:17, Is 34:11 yea the pelican and bittern shall possess it; so of nettles Ho 9:6; [[וְיִרַשׁ זַרְעֲ ְאֵת שַׁעַר אׂיְבָיו]] Ge 22:17, cf. Ge 24:60 (both J); possess houses Ez Eze 7:24 (del. Co), Ne 9:25; [[יוֹרֵשׁ עֶחֶר]] Ju Jdg 18:7 possessing wealth (? seeVB) †. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a people (with collat. idea of being their heir (

), and so dispossessing them.), so esp. in De 2:12, De 2:21, De 2:22, De 9:1 (+ cities), De 11:23, De 12:2, De 12:29, De 12:29, De 18:14, De 19:1, De 31:3, Nu 21:32 (Kt [[וַיִּירַשׁ]]; JE), Am 9:12; [[מַדּוּעַ יׇרַשׁ מִלְכּׂם אֶת־ גׇּ֑ד]] Je 49:1 (on text seeVB), v:Je 49:2; v:Je 49:2 (in these 3 perh. play on meaning inherit, cf. v:Je 49:1 a); Ez Eze 36:12, Ob:Ob 17, Is 54:3; nations + countries Ez Eze 35:10. †

inherit, sq. acc. pers. = be one's heir Ge 15:3, Ge 15:4, Ge 15:4 (JE); [[שִׁפְחָה כִּי־תִירַשׁ גְּבִרְתָּהּ]] Pr 30:23 (or, dispossess?); abs. be heir, sq. [[עִם]] pers. = jointly with Pr 21:10 (E); [[יּוֹרֵשׁ]]([[הַ]]) (the) heir 2Sa 14:7, Je 49:1 (‖[[בָּנִים]]); Mic 1:15 (= possessor, captor), where paronom. with n. pr. loc. [[מָרֵשָׁה]]; inherit persons, as slaves [[לָרֶשֶׁת אֲחֻוׇּה]] Le 25:46 (H). †
= impoverish, [[הַלְיׇרְשֵׁנוּ קְרָאתֶם]] Ju Jdg 14:15 to impoverish us did ye call (us)?

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִוׇּרֵשׁ]] Pr 23:21; 2 ms. [[תִּוׇּרֵשׁ]] Ge 45:11, Pr 20:13; [[אִוׇּרֵשׁ]] Pr 30:9; —be (dispossessed =) impoverished, come to poverty Ge 45:11 (E), Pr 20:13, Pr 23:21, Pr 30:9 (opp. [[אֶשְׂבַּע]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[פְּרִי אַדְמָתֶָ ְיְיׇרֵשׁ הַצְּלָחַֽל]] De 28:42 the fruit of thy ground shall the cricket get full possession of (cf. Qal Ho 9:6, Is 34:11), i.e. devour.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוֹרִישׁ]] Ju Jdg 1:27 +; 2 ms. [[הוֹרַשְׁתָּ]] 2Ch 20:7, Ps 44:3, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יוֹרִישׁ]] Jos 3:10; [[רֶשׁ]]([[וֹ]])[[וִיּ֫]] Ju Jdg 1:19 +; 3 fs. sf. 3 mpl. [[תּוֹרִישֵׁמוּ]] Ex 15:9, etc.; Inf. abs. [[הוֹרֵשׁ]] Jos 3:10, Jos 17:13; [[הוֹרֵישׁ]] Ju Jdg 1:28; cstr. [[לְהוֹרִישׁ]] De 4:38 +, etc.; Pt. [[מוֹרִישׁ]] 1Sa 2:7, De 18:12; sf. [[מוֹרִישָׁם]] De 9:4, De 9:5; —

cause to possess, or inherit Ju Jdg 11:24; [[מִיְּרֻשָּֽׁתְ ְאֲשֶׁר הוֹרַשְׁתָּנוּ]] 2Ch 20:11; sq. [[ל]] pers., [[וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּם לִבְנֵיכֶם]] Ezr 9:12 and cause your sons to inherit (it); fig. [[תּוֹרִישֵׁנִי]] [[עֲוֹנוֹת נְעוּרָָי]] Job 13:26 thou makest me to inherit (the consequences of) the iniquities of my youth.
cause (others) to possess or inherit, then gen. dispossess:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. acc.. gent. vel pers., Jos 13:13, Jos 16:10 (both JE), Ju Jdg 1:29, Jdg 1:30, Jdg 1:31, Jdg 1:32, Jdg 1:33 (all opp. [[ישׁב]] [[בְּקֶרֶב]]), Jos 14:12 (JE), Jos 17:13 (JE; [[הוֹרֵשׁ לאׁ הוֹרִישׁוֹ]]), Ju Jdg 1:28 (id.); opp. [[ישׁב אֵת]] Jos 15:63; opp. [[ישׁב בְּ]] Ju Jdg 1:21, Jdg 1:27; also Nu 21:32 Qr, Nu 32:39, Jos 17:18 (all JE), Jos 13:12 (D), Ju Jdg 1:19 b, Jdg 2:23; also [[וַיּׁרֶשׁאֶת־הָהָר]] Jdg 1:19 a (= [[את־יושׁבי ההר]] see V:b), De 7:17, Ps 44:3; [[וְהוֹרַשְׁתָּם]] [[וְהֵאֲבַדְתָּם]] De 9:3; sq. acc.. + [[מִפְּנֵי]] Ex 34:24, Nu 32:21, Jos 3:10 ([[הוֹרֵשׁ יוֹרִישׁ]]; all these JE), De 4:38, De 9:4, De 9:5, De 18:12, Jos 13:6, Jos 23:9 (both D), Nu 33:52, Nu 33:55 (both P), Ju Jdg 2:21, Jdg 11:23, Jdg 11:24, 1Ki 14:24, 1Ki 21:26, 2Ki 16:3, 2Ki 17:8, 2Ki 21:2 (all D), 2Ch 28:3, 2Ch 33:2; acc.. + [[מִלִּפְנֵי]] De 11:23, Jos 23:5, Jos 23:13 (D; ‖[[הָדַף]]), 2Ch 20:7; acc.. + [[מִשָּׁם]] Jos 15:14 (JE) = Ju Jdg 1:20; of cities (i.e. their inhabitants) Jos 8:7, Jos 17:12; so of a land = Nu 33:53 (P), see v:Nu 33:52; v:Nu 33:55 [LXX + [[יושׁבי]]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. acc.. rei, [[מִבִּטְנוֹ יׁרִשֶׁנּוּ אֵל]] Job 20:15 God shall cast them out of his belly, i.e. riches (‖[[חַיִל בָּלַע]] [[וַיְקִאֶנּוּ]]).
= impoverish, [[יהוה מוֹרִישׁ וּמַעֲשׁיר]] 1Sa 2:7 (song) ´[[י]] impoverisheth and maketh rich; sq. acc. (of Tyre) [[אֲדׂנׇי יוֹרִשֶׁנׇּה]] Zec 9:4 (see v:Zec 9:3).
nearly = bring to ruin, destroy, sq. acc. gent. [[אָרִיק חַרְבִּי תּוֹרִישֵׁמוֹ יׇדִי]] Ex 15:9 (poem in E); so perh. also Nu 14:12 (JE; AV disinherit; ‖[[אַכֶּנּוּ]] [[בַּדֶּבֶר]]).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: take possession of a land Nu 14:24 (JE), but rd. prob. [[יִרָשֶׁנׇּה]].
